description:
nova/ipv6/account_identifier.py has a single statement that isn't covered by unit tests. It looks like something that should be triggered by an invalid address being passed.

    https://jenkins.openstack.org/job/nova-coverage/1080/cobertura/nova_ipv6/account_identifier_py/
title: nova/ipv6/account_identifier.py is missing a unit test for invalid address
